title: Harlan's Point
description: Colorado Territory 1873: The railroad brings evil to strike at the very heart of the Fairchild family.All seems well for the future of Harlan's Crossing. The railroad track is underway and Leah Fairchild’s boarding house prospers while Cobb is forced to work long hours. But even the Sheriff’s watchful eyes cannot protect everyone and after a chilling event that strikes at the very heart of the Fairchild family, Ethan Cobb is forced to risk everything to save the woman he intends to marry.
author: Leona Grace
